channel.description: Recent content in specific-ip on IT Quicktasks

item.title: iptables: Allow Specific IP to Connect via SSH.
item.description: iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -s 114.191.33.88 --dport 22 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT iptables -A OUTPUT -p tcp --sport 22 -m conntrack --ctstate ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
